```{r echo=FALSE}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(xml2)
library(XML)
```

```{r}
res = GET("https://www.france24.com/fr/rss")
res
```


```{r}
rss_data<-read_xml(res$content)
rss_data
```

```{r}
xml_data<-xmlParse(rss_data)
xml_data
```

```{r}
xml_structure(rss_data)
```

```{r}
xml_find_all(rss_data,".//title")
```

```{r}
xml_text(xml_find_all(rss_data,".//title"))
```

```{r}
library(tibble)
```

```{r}

title<-xml_text(xml_find_all(rss_data, ".//title"))
desc<- xml_text(xml_find_all(rss_data, ".//description"))

df_title_desc<-tibble(title=title, description=desc)
df_title_desc
```
